t: Water Ridge Pull Out Kitchen Faucet - Amazon.com
s: The Water Ridge pull out faucet was fairly easy to install. However, when I went to connect the hoses, the connector was missing. I called the company and they were very friendly and sent me the missing part, which I received two days later.
